definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: Another is his birthplace - some of the president's detractors question the veracity of Mr. Obama's Hawaiian birth certificate.
sentences.chinese: 一些詆譭者對他夏威夷出生證的真實性提出了質疑。

sentences.english: Today, he demanded to see its birth certificate." –David Letterman
sentences.chinese: 今天，他要求驗看一下嬰兒的出生證明”。

sentences.english: A certified copy of the birth certificate.
He falsified his birth certificate to get a passport.
sentences.chinese: 爲了取得護照，他僞造了出生證明。

sentences.english: Birther lie was the most hurtful one.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬總統的出生證明事件是最令人震驚的。

sentences.english: That's more phony that 0bama's birth certificate.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬的出生證明有更多的假貨。

sentences.english: Even birth certificate reporting is catching up.
sentences.chinese: 甚至出生證報告都能出。

sentences.english: His birth certificate shows that he is Barack Obama's half-brother.
sentences.chinese: 他的出生證明顯示他是總統奧巴馬的同父兄弟。

sentences.english: Good thing President Obama released his long-form birth certificate.
sentences.chinese: 好東西總統奧巴馬發表了他的長篇出生證。

sentences.english: Your birth certificate is an apology letter from the condom factory.
sentences.chinese: 你的出生證明，是杜蕾斯寄給你父母的一封道歉信。

sentences.english: We received the Bith Certificate of baby yesterday, long form and short form.
sentences.chinese: 昨天下午收到了小孩出生證，長表和短表。

sentences.english: Counterfeit marriage licenses and birth certificates began appearing on the black market.
sentences.chinese: 黑市開始出現仿造的結婚證和出生證。

sentences.english: A birth certificate is also important for another reason.
sentences.chinese: 由於另一個原因，使出生證明變得很重要。
